\add When \add*our \w garners|strong="H4200"\w* \w are|strong="H4392"\w* \w full|strong="H4392"\w*, \w affording|strong="H6329"\w* all manner \w of|strong="H4392"\w* \w store|strong="H2177"\w*; \add and \add*our \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* bring \w forth|strong="H2351"\w* \w thousands|strong="H7231"\w* \w and|strong="H6629"\w* ten \w thousands|strong="H7231"\w* \w in|strong="H6629"\w* our \w fields|strong="H2351"\w*;
